titleInfo.title: King v. Wadsworth City Schools et al
titleInfo.subTitle: Report and Recommendation that the motion of the Medina County defendants should be GRANTED in full, and the motion of Wadsworth GRANTED in part and DENIED in part.The only remaining claim in this case is Count II against Wadsworth insofar as it alleges interference with King's parental rights as protected by the Ohio Constitution. As this case no longer includes a federal cause of action, the case should be remanded to the Medina Court of Common Pleas for further proceedings. Objections to this Report and Recommendation must be filed by October 29, 2009. Related documents 4, 10. Signed by Magistrate Judge Nancy A. Vecchiarelli on 10/15/09. (K,K)

extension.searchTitle: USCOURTS 1:09-cv-00924; King v. Wadsworth City Schools et al;
extension.courtName: United States District Court Northern District of Ohio
extension.docketText: Report and Recommendation that the motion of the Medina County defendants should be GRANTED in full, and the motion of Wadsworth GRANTED in part and DENIED in part.The only remaining claim in this case is Count II against Wadsworth insofar as it alleges interference with King's parental rights as protected by the Ohio Constitution. As this case no longer includes a federal cause of action, the case should be remanded to the Medina Court of Common Pleas for further proceedings. Objections to this Report and Recommendation must be filed by October 29, 2009. Related documents 4, 10. Signed by Magistrate Judge Nancy A. Vecchiarelli on 10/15/09. (K,K)

titleInfo.title: King v. Wadsworth City Schools et al
titleInfo.subTitle: Memorandum Opinion and Order ADOPTING IN PART ECF #14 the Report and Recommendation of Magistrate Judge Nancy A. Vecchiarelli. Both the re 4 Motion to dismiss and the Motion for Judgment on the Pleadings ECF #10 are GRANTED in their entirety. Accordingly, the Partial 15 Objection to Report and Recommendation filed by Wadsworth City Schools is SUSTAINED and Plaintiff's Objection ECF #16 to Report and Recommendation are OVERRULED. This case is TERMINATED. Judge Donald C. Nugent on 1/15/10. (E,P) Modified text on 1/19/2010 (E,P).

titleInfo.title: King v. Wadsworth City Schools et al
titleInfo.subTitle: Judgment, pursuant to Memorandum Opinion and Order ADOPTING IN PART ECF #14 The Report and Recommendation of Magistrate Judge Nancy A. Vecchiarelli. Both the Motion to Dismiss ECF #4 and the Motion for Judgment on the Pleadings ECF #10 are GRANTED in their entirety. Accordingly, the Partial Objections to the Report and Recommendation filed by Wadsworth City Schools is SUSTAINED ECF #15 and Plaintiff's objections ECF #16 to the Report and Recommendation are OVERRULED. This case is TERMINATED. Judge Donald C. Nugent on 1/15/10. (E,P) Modified text on 1/19/2010 (Related doc 19)(E,P).
